inputPortDescriptors.description: The directory containing GeoTIFF images to be converted. The task will walk the tree under this directory and attempt to convert any *.tif and *.TIF files. The directory structure for any converted images will be maintained in the outputs.
inputPortDescriptors.name: data

outputPortDescriptors.description: Output directory containing Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF image.
outputPortDescriptors.name: data

name: CloudOptimizedGeoTIFF
description: Generates a Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF from a standard GeoTIFF using GDAL v2.2.0. The task succeeds if any Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs are written to the output directory, even if some fail.

name: CloudOptimizedGeoTIFF
description: Generates a Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF from a standard GeoTIFF using GDAL v2.2.3 that is validated using the GDAL validation script at https://svn.osgeo.org/gdal/trunk/gdal/swig/python/samples/validate_cloud_optimized_geotiff.py.
